string:
<noname>This is <player>'s
farm in
Flower Bud
Village…
<player> has
successfully
revived the farm
and has lived
there trying
to find another
goal in life.
But, one day…

Hello <player>.
Are you busy as
usual? I have
something to ask
you today. My
friend owned a
farm on an
island, but he
recently passed
away. Now his
daughter decided
to work on the
farm, but she
does not know
anything about
farming… So,
I would like you
to help her! Can
you do it?
 Yes          No<ask>

Good! Thank you
<player>! Then
please head to
the island
tomorrow
morning.
Don't worry
about your farm.
Everyone in the
village will
take good care
of it.

<noname>This is how
<player>'s new
Harvest Moon
Adventure began…<fa>y

You are the only
one who knows
how to revive a
farm… Can you
please do it?
 Yes          No<ask>

Please! I'm
begging you!
You're the only
one!

 Yes          No<ask>

OK… That's too
bad… When did
you become so
mean…?

<noname>Soon after that,
the farm on the
island closed
down…
Harvest Moon 3
The End

<noname><name>R…Are you
saying we should
sell the farm?
<arrow>0

What's wrong
<player>? What? You
want to work on
the farm? It's
not as easy as
you think… You
still want to do
it for your
father…? I can
understand how
you feel, but…
<arrow>0

Hi Mr. Heinz.
What? He will
help <player>…?
They might be
able to do it
together… OK!<arrow>0

<player>, <var>0
owns a farm
in Mr. Heinz's
village and
he will be
coming to help
you. <var>0 is
a guy, will
that be OK?
<arrow>0

<noname>This is how
<player>'s new
Harvest Moon
Adventure began.<fa>y
